companies.company_name: Engie Brasil Energia S A Sponsored ADR

key_risks: Regulatory exposure due to operating in a heavily regulated industry
Vulnerability to climate change impacts, particularly droughts affecting hydropower
Market volatility in energy prices and demand in Brazil
controversies: Criticism from environmental groups regarding thermal power plants (natural gas and biomass)
environmental_issues: Reliance on hydropower makes operations susceptible to climate change and droughts
Environmental concerns related to thermal power plants
